tools.name: Lynis
tools.description: Security auditing tool for Linux, macOS, and UNIX-based systems. Assists with compliance testing (HIPAA/ISO27001/PCI DSS) and system hardening. Agentless, and installation optional.

tools.name: Nipper Studio
tools.description: Tool that parse router, switch, firewall configuration to discover vulnerabilities

tools.description: Tool that parse router, switch, firewall configuration to discover vulnerabilities
